Source.Name: grsync
Source.Description: Grsync is a GTK GUI (Graphical User Interface) for rsync, the commandline directory synchronization tool.

Update.Comment: * Removed automatic addition of a trailing slash to source and destination directories * Added "Rsync command line" menu item * Other minor bugfixes
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version jump: * "Use tray icon" preferences option added * Modified Makefile.am to exclude subversion directories from the tar distribution file, other small fixes * Added --protect-args option, on by default, solves the "remote filename with spaces" problem * Fixed bug: doesn't save "itemized changes list" option * Added mime type definition for grsync session files with icon * Updated desktop file to open session files with "grsync -i" * Made some fixes which could make grsync more stable on some systems * Added "run as superuser" extra options switch, uses "pkexec" from policykit * Added rsync child watch function * Added rsync process exit status output * Fixed behaviour when rsync window is closed not by using the close button * Added "contribute" menu item * Added workaround for freebsd and mac os X glib child watch problem * Fixed scrolling to end on pause * Added help dialog about the trailing slash on directories * Added -i option to import a session file from command line * Fixed main window position and size reset when closed with window manager's close button * Added advanced option to disable directory recursion * Added preferences option to enable the "switch source with destination" button * New main window layout, more compact and pretty. * Small fix to the pause button showing as "play" instead of "pause" in some occasions * "-s" command line option added, stays open on success * Fixed bug: when wrong session specified on the command line with "-e", executes default session instead of nothing * Advanced rsync option, "itemize-changes" added * Rsync dialog: added "warning" button which opens the error list, made "show error list when finished" preferences option default to false * Rsync window is now resizable * Removed "switch source with destination" button (there is a menu item for the same purpose) * Added "fast rsync scrolling" preferences switch * Added extra option "on rsync error only" to limit the execution of the "after" command * "Notes" session field added * Error dialog is now marked as "urgent" * New session dialog remembers last session name * Fixed some small memory leaks * New bigger icon * Translation and man page updates
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek
